Package com.g1.mychess.auth.client

Class PlayerServiceClient

java.lang.Object
com.g1.mychess.auth.client.PlayerServiceClient
@Service public class PlayerServiceClient extends Object
Service client to interact with the Player Service API for managing player data.

    • PlayerServiceClient

      public PlayerServiceClient(@Value("${player.service.url}") String playerServiceUrl, org.springframework.web.reactive.function.client.WebClient.Builder webClientBuilder)
      Constructor that initializes the WebClient with the provided Player Service URL.
      Parameters:
      playerServiceUrl - the URL of the Player Service (from application properties)
      webClientBuilder - the WebClient builder to create the WebClient instance

      Parameters:
      playerDTO - the player registration data
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the response from the Player Service

      Returns:
      the UserDTO containing the player's data

    • updatePassword

      public void updatePassword(Long playerId, String hashedPassword)
      Updates the password for a player in the Player Service.
      Parameters:
      playerId - the ID of the player whose password is being updated
      hashedPassword - the new hashed password
      Throws:
      PlayerServiceException - if there is an error updating the password
